PortNotes:['Acc'].field_desc: Portfolio notes, longer description than allowed in portfolio name
PortNotes:['Acc'].name: PortNotes

AccGroup:['Acc'].field_desc: Account group, could use to group multiple accounts (e.g. for binders)
AccGroup:['Acc'].name: AccGroup

AccStatus:['Acc'].field_desc: Account status. Aside from predefined values, you can use other single character values for user specific purposes
AccStatus:['Acc'].name: AccStatus

FlexiAccZZZ:['Acc'].field_desc: Flexible field that is stored in FlexiAcc table in ModifierName = ZZZ
FlexiAccZZZ:['Acc'].name: FlexiAccZZZ

PolStatus:['Acc'].field_desc: Policy layer status. Aside from predefined values, other single character values for user specific purposes can be used.
PolStatus:['Acc'].name: PolStatus

PolInceptionDate:['Acc'].field_desc: Policy inception date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
PolInceptionDate:['Acc'].name: PolInceptionDate

PolExpiryDate:['Acc'].field_desc: Policy expiry date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
PolExpiryDate:['Acc'].name: PolExpiryDate

LOB:['Acc'].field_desc: Line of business (defined at policy level)
LOB:['Acc'].name: LOB

LayerParticipation:['Acc'].field_desc: Insurance company share of the policy layer. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% entered as 0.12)
LayerParticipation:['Acc'].name: LayerParticipation

LayerLimit:['Acc'].field_desc: Policy layer limit (always treated as amount)
LayerLimit:['Acc'].name: LayerLimit

LayerAttachment:['Acc'].field_desc: Policy layer attachment point (always treated as amount)
LayerAttachment:['Acc'].name: LayerAttachment

HoursClause:['Acc'].field_desc: For perils with an inherent event duration, the insurance contract may contain an hours clause that limits the time in which claims can be added up and assigned to one event
HoursClause:['Acc'].name: HoursClause

PolLimitCode6All:['Acc'].field_desc: Policy blanket limit code (annual aggregate only)
PolLimitCode6All:['Acc'].name: PolLimitCode6All

StepTriggerType:['Acc'].field_desc: Code that represents how, and for which coverages, pay-outs are triggered.
StepTriggerType:['Acc'].name: StepTriggerType

StepNumber:['Acc'].field_desc: Number between 1 and 10 that is used to sort the step function in the correct order.
StepNumber:['Acc'].name: StepNumber

PayOutType:['Acc'].field_desc: Refers to PayoutBuilding, PayoutContents, PayoutBuildingContents. Payout can be % TIV, % Loss, a monetary amount, or % Limit.
PayOutType:['Acc'].name: PayOutType

TriggerType:['Acc'].field_desc: Refers to TriggerStart and TriggerEnd fields which could be specified as a % TIV, % Loss or a monetary amount.
TriggerType:['Acc'].name: TriggerType

TriggerBuildingStart:['Acc'].field_desc: Starting value of the building damage range over which the corresponding pay-out(s) should be made.
TriggerBuildingStart:['Acc'].name: TriggerBuildingStart

TriggerBuildingEnd:['Acc'].field_desc: Ending value of the building damage range over which the corresponding pay-out(s) should be made.
TriggerBuildingEnd:['Acc'].name: TriggerBuildingEnd

DeductibleBuilding:['Acc'].field_desc: Building deductible that can be used, for example, to account for fire policies before applying step functions.
DeductibleBuilding:['Acc'].name: DeductibleBuilding

PayOutBuildingStart:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out amount for the building losses for this step. If a ramp policy then it represents the start payout value.
PayOutBuildingStart:['Acc'].name: PayOutBuildingStart

PayOutBuildingEnd:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out amount for the end-point building losses for this ramp. This field should only be used if you have a ramp policy to indicate the end of the building payout. Otherwise, it should be left blank.
PayOutBuildingEnd:['Acc'].name: PayOutBuildingEnd

TriggerContentsStart:['Acc'].field_desc: Starting value of the content damage range over which the corresponding pay-out(s) should be made.
TriggerContentsStart:['Acc'].name: TriggerContentsStart

TriggerContentsEnd:['Acc'].field_desc: Ending value of the content damage range over which the corresponding pay-out(s) should be made.
TriggerContentsEnd:['Acc'].name: TriggerContentsEnd

DeductibleContents:['Acc'].field_desc: Content deductible that can be used, for example, to account for fire policies before applying step functions.
DeductibleContents:['Acc'].name: DeductibleContents

PayOutContentsStart:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out amount for the contents losses for this step. If a ramp policy then it represents the start payout value.
PayOutContentsStart:['Acc'].name: PayOutContentsStart

PayOutContentsEnd:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out amount for the end-point contents losses for this ramp. This field should only be used if you have a ramp policy to indicate the end of the contents payout. Otherwise, it should be left blank.
PayOutContentsEnd:['Acc'].name: PayOutContentsEnd

TriggerBuildingContentsStart:['Acc'].field_desc: Starting value of the building and content damage range over which the corresponding pay-out(s) should be made.
TriggerBuildingContentsStart:['Acc'].name: TriggerBuildingContentsStart

TriggerBuildingContentsEnd:['Acc'].field_desc: Ending value of the building and content damage range over which the corresponding pay-out(s) should be made.
TriggerBuildingContentsEnd:['Acc'].name: TriggerBuildingContentsEnd

DeductibleBuildingContents:['Acc'].field_desc: Building and contents deductible that can be used, for example, to account for fire policies before applying step functions.
DeductibleBuildingContents:['Acc'].name: DeductibleBuildingContents

PayOutBuildingContentsStart:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out amount for the building and contents losses for this step. If a ramp policy then it represents the start payout value.
PayOutBuildingContentsStart:['Acc'].name: PayOutBuildingContentsStart

PayOutBuildingContentsEnd:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out amount for the end-point building and contents losses for this ramp. This field should only be used if you have a ramp policy to indicate the end of the building and contents payout. Otherwise, it should be left blank.
PayOutBuildingContentsEnd:['Acc'].name: PayOutBuildingContentsEnd

PayOutLimitBuildingContents:['Acc'].field_desc: Pay-out limit for building and contents
PayOutLimitBuildingContents:['Acc'].name: PayOutLimitBuildingContents

ExtraExpenseFactor:['Acc'].field_desc: A factor that is applied to main coverage loss for extra expenses. This value, entered as a decimal, should be the same for all steps for a policy contract and must be a value >0 and ≤1. For example, 0.12 for 12%.
ExtraExpenseFactor:['Acc'].name: ExtraExpenseFactor

ExtraExpenseLimit:['Acc'].field_desc: A limit that applies to the total extra expense loss
ExtraExpenseLimit:['Acc'].name: ExtraExpenseLimit

DebrisRemovalFactor:['Acc'].field_desc: A factor for a conditional coverage which tends to apply to all steps and is to cover Debris Removal. This value, entered as a decimal, should be the same for all steps for a policy contract and must be a value >0 and ≤1. For example, 0.12 for 12%.
DebrisRemovalFactor:['Acc'].name: DebrisRemovalFactor

MinimumTIV:['Acc'].field_desc: Minimum replacement value for which pay-outs to the corresponding damage range will be allowed.
MinimumTIV:['Acc'].name: MinimumTIV

ScaleFactor:['Acc'].field_desc: Percentage factor used to scale calculated losses. This value, entered as a decimal, should be the same for all steps for a policy contract and must be a value >0 and ≤1. For example, 0.12 for 12%.
ScaleFactor:['Acc'].name: ScaleFactor

IsLimitAtDamage:['Acc'].field_desc: Indicates whether the pay-out is limited by the actual ground-up loss.
IsLimitAtDamage:['Acc'].name: IsLimitAtDamage

FlexiPolZZZ:['Acc'].field_desc: Flexible field that is stored in FlexiPol table in ModifierName = ZZZ
FlexiPolZZZ:['Acc'].name: FlexiPolZZZ

CondNumber:['Acc'].field_desc: Condition number identifies a unique set of condition financial terms applicable to one or more CondTag's.
CondNumber:['Acc'].name: CondNumber

CondPriority:['Acc'].field_desc: Condition priority: specifies the order in which special conditions apply if multiple conditions apply to one location.
CondPriority:['Acc'].name: CondPriority

CondDedCode2Other:['Acc'].field_desc: Special condition other building deductible code
CondDedCode2Other:['Acc'].name: CondDedCode2Other

CondDedType2Other:['Acc'].field_desc: Special condition other building deductible type
CondDedType2Other:['Acc'].name: CondDedType2Other

CondMinDed2Other:['Acc'].field_desc: Special condition minimum other building deductible
CondMinDed2Other:['Acc'].name: CondMinDed2Other

CondMaxDed2Other:['Acc'].field_desc: Special condition maximum other building deductible
CondMaxDed2Other:['Acc'].name: CondMaxDed2Other

CondLimitCode2Other:['Acc'].field_desc: Special condition other building limit code
CondLimitCode2Other:['Acc'].name: CondLimitCode2Other

CondLimitType2Other:['Acc'].field_desc: Special condition other building limit type
CondLimitType2Other:['Acc'].name: CondLimitType2Other

CorrelationGroup:['Loc'].field_desc: Correlation Group: indicates which locations should be correlated between each other in Oasis LMF.
CorrelationGroup:['Loc'].name: CorrelationGroup

IsPrimary:['Loc'].field_desc: Whether the location in LocGroup is the primary building in the group
IsPrimary:['Loc'].name: IsPrimary

IsTenant:['Loc'].field_desc: Whether property is occupied by a tenant or not
IsTenant:['Loc'].name: IsTenant

LocInceptionDate:['Loc'].field_desc: Location inception date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
LocInceptionDate:['Loc'].name: LocInceptionDate

LocExpiryDate:['Loc'].field_desc: Location expiry date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
LocExpiryDate:['Loc'].name: LocExpiryDate

PercentComplete:['Loc'].field_desc: Completeness percentage of the construction project at this location. The project completion percentage is by the cost of the project. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% enterd as 0.12)
PercentComplete:['Loc'].name: PercentComplete

CompletionDate:['Loc'].field_desc: Construction project completion date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
CompletionDate:['Loc'].name: CompletionDate

CountryCode:['Loc'].field_desc: Country code (based on ISO3166 alpha-2 codes)
CountryCode:['Loc'].name: CountryCode

PostalCode:['Loc'].field_desc: Postcode: the highest resolution postcode most often used. (e.g. 5 digit zip for the US).
PostalCode:['Loc'].name: PostalCode

AreaCode:['Loc'].field_desc: Code representing typically the largest sub-division in a country (e.g. State code). See AreaCode Values sheet for details.
AreaCode:['Loc'].name: AreaCode

AreaName:['Loc'].field_desc: Name relating to the AreaCode (e.g. State name). See AreaCode Values sheet for details.
AreaName:['Loc'].name: AreaName

GeogSchemeXX:['Loc'].field_desc: Geography scheme: Descriptor of the geography scheme used in relation to the geography name in the corresponding GeogName field (e.g. PC4). The 'XX' must be changed to an integer (GeogScheme1......> GeogScheme30 (max) etc) and the user can specify values in addition to those listed in the GeogScheme values list, but user defined scheme values must start with 'X'.
GeogSchemeXX:['Loc'].name: GeogSchemeXX

GeogNameXX:['Loc'].field_desc: Geography name: Descriptor of the geographical area, using the scheme referenced in the corresponding GeogScheme field (e.g. SO31)
GeogNameXX:['Loc'].name: GeogNameXX

AddressMatch:['Loc'].field_desc: Address match from geocoder: indicating the resolution that the latitude / longitude represents
AddressMatch:['Loc'].name: AddressMatch

GeocodeQuality:['Loc'].field_desc: Geocode quality (values between 0 and 1 e.g. 80% is entered as 0.8)
GeocodeQuality:['Loc'].name: GeocodeQuality

Geocoder:['Loc'].field_desc: Company name / version of geocoder. Free text field.
Geocoder:['Loc'].name: Geocoder

FloorArea:['Loc'].field_desc: Floor area: the total area across all floors
FloorArea:['Loc'].name: FloorArea

FloorAreaUnit:['Loc'].field_desc: Units in which FloorArea is specified
FloorAreaUnit:['Loc'].name: FloorAreaUnit

FlexiLocZZZ:['Loc'].field_desc: Flexible field that is stored in FlexiLoc table in ModifierName = ZZZ
FlexiLocZZZ:['Loc'].name: FlexiLocZZZ

OtherTIV:['Loc'].field_desc: Other Building Insured Value (primarily aimed at specific US policies). For motor exposures, use this field for TIV along with appropriate motor construction code.
OtherTIV:['Loc'].name: OtherTIV

BIPOI:['Loc'].field_desc: BI period of indemnity (in days, in increments of 0.5 days). Default value = 365 (1 year).
BIPOI:['Loc'].name: BIPOI

LocGrossPremium:['Loc'].field_desc: Gross premium amount at location level
LocGrossPremium:['Loc'].name: LocGrossPremium

LocTax:['Loc'].field_desc: Insurance tax amount at location level
LocTax:['Loc'].name: LocTax

NonCatGroundUpLoss:['Loc'].field_desc: Ground-Up non-cat loss value prior to the application of non-cat policy terms
NonCatGroundUpLoss:['Loc'].name: NonCatGroundUpLoss

LocParticipation:['Loc'].field_desc: Percentage of risk that the insurer covers for this location. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% enterd as 0.12). Usually used in binders or offshore.
LocParticipation:['Loc'].name: LocParticipation

PayoutBasis:['Loc'].field_desc: Pay-out basis for the claim (whether depreciation is taken into account). ACV = RCV - depreciation.
PayoutBasis:['Loc'].name: PayoutBasis

ReinsTag:['Loc'].field_desc: User defined reinsurance tag to provide a further option for specifying reinsurance scope
ReinsTag:['Loc'].name: ReinsTag

YearUpgraded:['Loc'].field_desc: Year the building was upgraded (4 digit year)
YearUpgraded:['Loc'].name: YearUpgraded

SurgeLeakage:['Loc'].field_desc: Storm leakage percentage (0% to 100%) for Wind only policies
SurgeLeakage:['Loc'].name: SurgeLeakage

PercentSprinklered:['Loc'].field_desc: Percent sprinklered. Values between 0 and 1 inclusive (0.5 = 50%); -999 is unknown
PercentSprinklered:['Loc'].name: PercentSprinklered

RoofCover:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the material used to cover the roof
RoofCover:['Loc'].name: RoofCover

RoofYearBuilt:['Loc'].field_desc: Year the roof was last replaced (4 digit year)
RoofYearBuilt:['Loc'].name: RoofYearBuilt

RoofGeometry:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the shape of the roof
RoofGeometry:['Loc'].name: RoofGeometry

RoofEquipment:['Loc'].field_desc: captures if mechanical or electric equipment is braced on the roof and the impact this modifier will have on the losses.
RoofEquipment:['Loc'].name: RoofEquipment

RoofMaintenance:['Loc'].field_desc: Captures the impact roof maintenance has on the losses
RoofMaintenance:['Loc'].name: RoofMaintenance

RoofAttachedStructures:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that identifies items mounted on the roof, such as A/C units, skylights, or dormers
RoofAttachedStructures:['Loc'].name: RoofAttachedStructures

RoofDeck:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the materials used to construct the roof deck
RoofDeck:['Loc'].name: RoofDeck

RoofPitch:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the slope of the roof
RoofPitch:['Loc'].name: RoofPitch

RoofAnchorage:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the connections used to secure the roof support system to the walls
RoofAnchorage:['Loc'].name: RoofAnchorage

RoofDeckAttachment:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the connections used to secure the roof deck to the underlying roof support system
RoofDeckAttachment:['Loc'].name: RoofDeckAttachment

RoofCoverAttachment:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the connections used to secure the roof covering to the roof deck
RoofCoverAttachment:['Loc'].name: RoofCoverAttachment

GlassType:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the type of glass used in the building
GlassType:['Loc'].name: GlassType

LatticeType:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the type of web used for H-shaped steel
LatticeType:['Loc'].name: LatticeType

SoftStory:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that indicates if there is structural weakness at any floor.  First floor garages and taller first floors are likely to exhibit soft-story behaviour.
SoftStory:['Loc'].name: SoftStory

Basement:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that defines if there is a basement and if so whether it is finished or unfinished
Basement:['Loc'].name: Basement

BasementLevelCount:['Loc'].field_desc: Indicates the number of basement levels in a structure (supports up to 5 levels; for more than 5, enter 5).
BasementLevelCount:['Loc'].name: BasementLevelCount

WindowProtection:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the wind protection systems used on the windows
WindowProtection:['Loc'].name: WindowProtection

FoundationType:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the construction type of the building's foundation
FoundationType:['Loc'].name: FoundationType

WallAttachedStructure:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents a structure that is physically attached to the building, such as garage or balcony
WallAttachedStructure:['Loc'].name: WallAttachedStructure

AppurtenantStructure:['Loc'].field_desc: Code for the appurtenant building, such as shed or detached garage
AppurtenantStructure:['Loc'].name: AppurtenantStructure

GroundEquipment:['Loc'].field_desc: Captures whether mechanical or electrical equipment are present on the ground level of a building and impact it has on losses
GroundEquipment:['Loc'].name: GroundEquipment

EquipmentBracing:['Loc'].field_desc: Identifies where mechanical or electrical equipment is held in place by bracing
EquipmentBracing:['Loc'].name: EquipmentBracing

Flashing:['Loc'].field_desc: Refers to the impact the quality of the flashing or coping on a roof has on losses
Flashing:['Loc'].name: Flashing

BuildingShape:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the shape of the building
BuildingShape:['Loc'].name: BuildingShape

ShapeIrregularity:['Loc'].field_desc: Identifies vertical irregularities, overhangs and setbacks in the building design
ShapeIrregularity:['Loc'].name: ShapeIrregularity

Pounding:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the distance to the closest structure, which if not adequate, can cause the two structures to collide during earthquake shaking
Pounding:['Loc'].name: Pounding

Ornamentation:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the amount of decorative elements attached to the exterior of a building
Ornamentation:['Loc'].name: Ornamentation

SpecialEQConstruction:['Loc'].field_desc: Presence of a seismic base isolation system
SpecialEQConstruction:['Loc'].name: SpecialEQConstruction

Retrofit:['Loc'].field_desc: Presence of retro fit connectivity between walls and floor for retro fit buildings
Retrofit:['Loc'].name: Retrofit

CrippleWall:['Loc'].field_desc: Presence of cripple walls on the first floor or frame buildings
CrippleWall:['Loc'].name: CrippleWall

FoundationConnection:['Loc'].field_desc: Connection of frame to foundation with or without bolts
FoundationConnection:['Loc'].name: FoundationConnection

ShortColumn:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that indicates if there are short columns in the building
ShortColumn:['Loc'].name: ShortColumn

Fatigue:['Loc'].field_desc: Captures signs of damage from prior earthquakes
Fatigue:['Loc'].name: Fatigue

Cladding:['Loc'].field_desc: The presence and material of exterior building cladding
Cladding:['Loc'].name: Cladding

FirstFloorHeight:['Loc'].field_desc: Height of the lowest floor (above ground) of the building with respect to local ground elevation (NOT relative to datum). First floor in the US is identical to ground floor in Europe.
FirstFloorHeight:['Loc'].name: FirstFloorHeight

FirstFloorHeightUnit:['Loc'].field_desc: Code for the unit of measure used to express FirstFloorHeight
FirstFloorHeightUnit:['Loc'].name: FirstFloorHeightUnit

Datum:['Loc'].field_desc: Datum reference for the elevation fields (e.g. NAVD88; WGS84)
Datum:['Loc'].name: Datum

GroundElevation:['Loc'].field_desc: Flood or Windstorm - Elevation of the local ground surface at the building at this location. This field represents the elevation of the grade (local ground surface) with respect to the datum (e.g. NAVD88).
GroundElevation:['Loc'].name: GroundElevation

GroundElevationUnit:['Loc'].field_desc: Code for the unit of measure used to express the GroundElevation
GroundElevationUnit:['Loc'].name: GroundElevationUnit

Tank:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that indicates if there are rooftop tanks on the adjoining higher buildings
Tank:['Loc'].name: Tank

Redundancy:['Loc'].field_desc: Indicates whether there are multiple lateral load resisting elements, such as frames or shear walls
Redundancy:['Loc'].name: Redundancy

InternalPartition:['Loc'].field_desc: Interior wall partitions or chimneys made from URM
InternalPartition:['Loc'].name: InternalPartition

ExternalDoors:['Loc'].field_desc: Wind resistant doors, doors with a certain rating of hurricane protection
ExternalDoors:['Loc'].name: ExternalDoors

Torsion:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the layout of structural elements that can lead to torsional loads
Torsion:['Loc'].name: Torsion

MechanicalEquipmentSide:['Loc'].field_desc: Mechanical or electrical equipment at the side
MechanicalEquipmentSide:['Loc'].name: MechanicalEquipmentSide

ContentsWindVuln:['Loc'].field_desc: Contents relative vulnerability to windstorm or tornado
ContentsWindVuln:['Loc'].name: ContentsWindVuln

SmallDebris:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that identifies whether small debris are present within 200 meters of the structure
SmallDebris:['Loc'].name: SmallDebris

FloorsOccupied:['Loc'].field_desc: Number of floors in the building that are occupied (separated by semi-colons). Each floor occupied is separated by a semi-colon. Ranges are not accepted. 0 = ground floor, -1 = first level of basement, -2 = second level of basement; 1 = first floor, 2 = second floor, etc.
FloorsOccupied:['Loc'].name: FloorsOccupied

FloodDefenseHeight:['Loc'].field_desc: Height of any site specific flood defenses protecting the property with respect to local ground elevation (NOT to datum).
FloodDefenseHeight:['Loc'].name: FloodDefenseHeight

FloodDefenseHeightUnit:['Loc'].field_desc: Code for the unit of measure used to express the FloodDefenseHeight
FloodDefenseHeightUnit:['Loc'].name: FloodDefenseHeightUnit

FloodDebrisResilience:['Loc'].field_desc: Shows if building is vulnerable to floating debris
FloodDebrisResilience:['Loc'].name: FloodDebrisResilience

BaseFloodElevation:['Loc'].field_desc: Water surface elevation (relative to datum - this is NOT a flood depth) corresponding to a flood having a 1% probability of being equaled or exceeded in a given year. A value of -999 for this field represents unknown/default.
BaseFloodElevation:['Loc'].name: BaseFloodElevation

BaseFloodElevationUnit:['Loc'].field_desc: Code for the unit of measure used to express the BaseFloodElevation
BaseFloodElevationUnit:['Loc'].name: BaseFloodElevationUnit

BuildingValuation:['Loc'].field_desc: Field for third party valuation data
BuildingValuation:['Loc'].name: BuildingValuation

TreeExposure:['Loc'].field_desc: Secondary modifier coding density of trees adjacent to structure
TreeExposure:['Loc'].name: TreeExposure

Chimney:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that indicates if the structure has a chimney and, if so, the height of the chimney
Chimney:['Loc'].name: Chimney

Packaging:['Loc'].field_desc: Describes the susceptibility of the packaging of a risk to the peril
Packaging:['Loc'].name: Packaging

Protection:['Loc'].field_desc: Describes the level of protection from the specific peril
Protection:['Loc'].name: Protection

SalvageProtection:['Loc'].field_desc: The salvage potential of a particular product
SalvageProtection:['Loc'].name: SalvageProtection

ValuablesStorage:['Loc'].field_desc: Where the specie element is stored
ValuablesStorage:['Loc'].name: ValuablesStorage

DaysHeld:['Loc'].field_desc: Number of days cargo is kept at port or the duration of an exhibition. Values between 0 to 1825 (up to 5 years). Default = 365.
DaysHeld:['Loc'].name: DaysHeld

BrickVeneer:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the percentage of external walls that consist of brick veneer.
BrickVeneer:['Loc'].name: BrickVeneer

FEMACompliance:['Loc'].field_desc: Indicates whether the building is in compliance with the FEMA flood zone requirements in both design and construction
FEMACompliance:['Loc'].name: FEMACompliance

CustomFloodSOP:['Loc'].field_desc: Standard of flood protection return period; values from 0-10,000
CustomFloodSOP:['Loc'].name: CustomFloodSOP

MultiStoryHall:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that indicates if the building has a multi-story hall
MultiStoryHall:['Loc'].name: MultiStoryHall

BuildingExteriorOpening:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that represents the percentage of exterior walls that are open (i.e. have windows or doors)
BuildingExteriorOpening:['Loc'].name: BuildingExteriorOpening

ServiceEquipmentProtection:['Loc'].field_desc: Code that indicates whether the service equipment is protected from flood
ServiceEquipmentProtection:['Loc'].name: ServiceEquipmentProtection

TallOneStory:['Loc'].field_desc: The height of the taller than usual one-story building (e.g. gymnasium, auditorium, church, etc.)
TallOneStory:['Loc'].name: TallOneStory

ReinsLayerNumber:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance layer for information / ordering purposes
ReinsLayerNumber:['ReinsInfo'].name: ReinsLayerNumber

ReinsInceptionDate:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance inception date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
ReinsInceptionDate:['ReinsInfo'].name: ReinsInceptionDate

ReinsExpiryDate:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance expiry date - in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD
ReinsExpiryDate:['ReinsInfo'].name: ReinsExpiryDate

CededPercent:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance ceded percentage. Used mainly in surplus treaties. Applies before other reinsurance terms. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% entered as 0.12)
CededPercent:['ReinsInfo'].name: CededPercent

OccReverseFranchise:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance reverse franchise - a value of loss that, if exceeded, results in no payment being made for this event from the reinsurer to insurer.
OccReverseFranchise:['ReinsInfo'].name: OccReverseFranchise

AggLimit:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Maximum amount payable under this treaty during the AggPeriod
AggLimit:['ReinsInfo'].name: AggLimit

AggAttachment:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: The aggregate monetary amount during a given AggPeriod that the resinured retains under this treaty
AggAttachment:['ReinsInfo'].name: AggAttachment

AggPeriod:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Aggregate period associated with the aggregate limits and attachments (in days). Default value = 365 (1 year)
AggPeriod:['ReinsInfo'].name: AggPeriod

PlacedPercent:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Percentage of the limit that has been placed in the reinsurance market. The main percentage used for reinsurance treaties other than surplus. Applies after other reinsurance terms. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% entered as 0.12)
PlacedPercent:['ReinsInfo'].name: PlacedPercent

InuringPriority:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance inuring priority capturing the order in which reinsurance contracts apply. Treaties with lower number inuring priorities apply first.
InuringPriority:['ReinsInfo'].name: InuringPriority

ReinstatementCharge:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinstatement charge as %; semi-colon separated if different for each reinstatement (e.g. 1-free, 2-50%, 3-100% should be entered as: 0;0.5;1). If all reinstatements are the same, then just one number is sufficient (e.g. 3 reinstatements at 100% should be entered as 1)
ReinstatementCharge:['ReinsInfo'].name: ReinstatementCharge

DeemedPercentPlaced:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Deemed percent placed, used to represent notional contracts or any part of the contract being notional. For fully notional contracts, enter 1 (i.e. 100%). For partially placed contracts, enter any value between 0 and 1. For real contracts, enter 0.
DeemedPercentPlaced:['ReinsInfo'].name: DeemedPercentPlaced

ReinsFXrate:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: Reinsurance exchange rate (as the contractual reinsurance rate can be different from the actual exchange rates used for policies and locations)
ReinsFXrate:['ReinsInfo'].name: ReinsFXrate

TreatyShare:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: The percentage of a treaty that a given reinsurer may write. Values between 0 to 1 (e.g. 12% entered as 0.12).
TreatyShare:['ReinsInfo'].name: TreatyShare

UseReinsDates:['ReinsInfo'].field_desc: A flag to indicate if reinsurance contract dates or  policy inception / expiry dates are to be considered when calculating losses (Y) or ignored (N).
UseReinsDates:['ReinsInfo'].name: UseReinsDates

ReinsNumber:['ReinsScope'].field_desc: Reinsurance number to link with ReinsInfo file
ReinsNumber:['ReinsScope'].name: ReinsNumber

PortNumber:['ReinsScope'].field_desc: Portfolio number: used for defining treaty scope in the reinsurance scope file
PortNumber:['ReinsScope'].name: PortNumber

AccNumber:['ReinsScope'].field_desc: Account number:  used for defining treaty scope in the reinsurance scope file
AccNumber:['ReinsScope'].name: AccNumber

PolNumber:['ReinsScope'].field_desc: Policy number:  used for defining treaty scope in the reinsurance scope file
PolNumber:['ReinsScope'].name: PolNumber

ReinsTag:['ReinsScope'].name: ReinsTag

CededPercent:['ReinsScope'].name: CededPercent

CondTag:['Acc', 'Loc'].name: CondTag
